title: Outlaw

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player to Rob at night up to 4 times. You will roleblock them.
- If another town member attacks the player you're Robbing tonight, you will increase their attack by one stage tonight.
- The other player will not know their attack was increased. You will not know if you increased their attack.

desc:
Post 3460
*In a wild-west themed trio with the sheriff and the cowboy*
